attributes.action: Invest more in the National Amulance Services in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a little known fact that the Ambulance Service in the UK is a poor relation of the NHS, underpaid, underfunded and has little or no voice in political forums that involve Ambulance/ NHS buisness in general. The governmant should take notice and invest much more in the Ambulance Services to ensure that current equipment are upto date, cover is maintained at a reasonable level i.e. more vehicles on the road and listen to staff.
